content: "Top Gun" pretends two Hollywood actors were invited to a prestigious school for fighter pilots while in fact there is no record of Tom Cruise serving in any branch of the military. Also turns out Anthony Edwards is alive and well.,https://,twitter.com/DineshDSouza/s,tatus/998255390738481152, ,…

"An American Tail" pretends that America's immigrant communities in the late 1800's were populated by sentient European mice when in fact there is no evidence that cartoons are capable of breathing oxygen.

"Sargent York" pretends that rural Tennessee, WWI France, and Gary Cooper appeared to the human eye as black-and-white. In fact the whole world has always had all the colors, Gary Cooper had a fondness earth tones.
